title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 800.25 - Special use vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 800.25 - Special use vehicles

State Regulations
A vehicle used exclusively for a special purpose, such as
the transportation of neonates, may be authorized by the commissioner, pursuant
to a written application by the service, to not carry specific items of
equipment otherwise required by these regulations if the equipment is shown to
be unnecessary for the special use proposed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
800.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
